text: The New Zealand Abortion Legislation Act 2020 is an Act of Parliament in New Zealand that amends the law to decriminalise abortion. Under the act, abortion is available without restrictions to any woman who is not more than 20 weeks pregnant. Women seeking an abortion after 20 weeks have to be looked at by a qualified health professional. ==References== Category:New Zealand legislation Category:Court cases and laws about abortion Category:2020s in New Zealand
title: Abortion Legislation Act 2020
